text: Dixie is a bus rapid transit station on the Mississauga Transitway in central Mississauga, Ontario, Canada. It is located on the west side of Dixie Road along the north side of Eastgate Parkway. The first four stations on the Transitway at Central Parkway, Cawthra, Tomken and Dixie, opened on 17 November 2014. ==Bus service== ===GO Transit=== *19 Mississauga/North York *40 Hamilton/ Richmond Hill Pearson Express ===MiWay=== *5 Dixie *73 Kamato *74 Explorer *100 Airport Express *107 Malton Express *109 Meadowvale Express *185 Dixie Express ===Brampton Transit=== *185 Dixie Express ==References== ==External links== Category:Mississauga Transitway Category:GO Transit bus terminals
title: Dixie station (MiWay)
